game.name: Lossless Scaling
game.shortDescription: All-in-one gaming utility for frame generation and scaling
game.shortDescriptionEn: All-in-one gaming utility for frame generation and scaling

reviewHighlights.text: Honestly worth the 7$ just to be able to have frame gen on older games that don't support higher framerates. Works well for current gen games that don...
actual gamechanger. using adaptive framegen 3.1 to push 65-75fps all the way up to a flawless 144fps with no visible artifacting is honestly just blac...
